sentence.Network_en: These people are guilty of acts of great atrocity.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些人犯有令人发指的暴行.

sentence.Network_en: He is as cool as a cucumber upon every act of atrocity.
sentence.Network_cn: 他面对一切暴行都表现得冷静沉着.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词根6 - Leo.Zhu - 博客园 ... atrocious a 残暴的 atrocity n 残暴 aureate v 镀金.
GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... atrocious adj. 残忍的,凶恶的 atrocity n. 残暴,暴行 atrophy n.v. 萎缩,衰退.
松松：3天背完GRE难词 ... chagrin ：n. 委屈，懊恼, 气愤 5。 atrocity：n. 残暴, 暴行, 凶恶 7。 avert：v. 转移 8。.
atrocious weather 恶劣的天气atrocity 恶毒atrophia 萎缩

list.abs: We have forgiven these atrocities as otherwise we simply could not ascend ., 我们已经宽恕了这些暴行 , 因为否则我们就无法提升.
Japan , stop covering up war atrocities !, 倭国 , 停止隐瞒战争罪行!
prepared to commit any atrocity to demoralize ., 准备好接受干任何罪行打击.

China , Korea and some other Asian countries see the Yasukuni Shrine a symbol of Japan's militarist past and the country's of contrition for wartime atrocities .中国、韩国和一些其它亚洲国家将靖国神社看作日本军国主义历史和该国对战时暴行缺乏悔悟的标志。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'cruelty'): from French atrocité or Latin atrocitas, from atrox, atroc- 'cruel'

entry.def: An atrocity is a very cruel, shocking action.

example.ex: The killing was cold-blooded, and those who committed this atrocity should be tried and punished.
example.tran: 杀戮异常残暴。那些犯下如此暴行的人都应该受到审判和惩罚。

means.word_mean: 1. the quality of being shockingly cruel and inhumane

auth_sentence.content: No country can be led with atrocity and oppression.
auth_sentence.res_content: No country can be led with atrocity and oppression.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No country can be led with atrocity and oppression.

auth_sentence.content: Two hundred and seventy people died in the atrocity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Two hundred and seventy people died in the atrocity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Two hundred and seventy people died in the atrocity.

auth_sentence.content: The atrocity was widely reported in the press.
auth_sentence.res_content: The atrocity was widely reported in the press.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The atrocity was widely reported in the press.

sentences.en: These people are guilty of acts of great atrocity.
sentences.cn: 这些人犯有令人发指的暴行。

jushi.english: The invading army committed many atrocities on innocent women and children.
jushi.chinese: 侵略军对无辜的妇女和儿童犯下了许多暴行。

jushi.english: The enemy committed atrocities against the civilian population.
jushi.chinese: 敌人对平民犯下了种种罪行。

jushi.english: Many atrocities are committed on innocent people in wartime.
jushi.chinese: 战争时期无辜的人民会遭到许多暴行。
